Bash(git -C "e:/Github/hybe-hydra" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Campaign refactoring, compose flow improvements, and artist management

## Campaign Pages
- Refactor campaign detail page with better data fetching
- Simplify analytics page structure
- Improve info page layout
- Add assets page for campaign media management

## Compose Flow
- Enhance script, image, music, and effect steps
- Improve InlineComposeFlow with better state management
- Refactor PersonalizePromptModal for cleaner code

## Artist Management
- Add artist settings page (settings/artists)
- Replace AddArtistModal with new ArtistModal component
- Add artist CRUD API endpoints

## UI Components
- Add inline-tag-input component
- Add keyword-input-popover component

## Backend
- Update compose-engine effects registry
- Improve video renderer service
- Enhance slideshow renderer engine

## Other
- Update i18n translations (ko/en)
- Add generate-image-prompt API
- Improve Google search integration
- Update workflow store and queries

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "e:/Github/hybe-hydra" add app/api/v1/fast-cut/images/search/route.ts app/api/v1/fast-cut/audio/analyze/route.ts components/features/create/fast-cut/FastCutImageStep.tsx components/features/create/fast-cut/InlineFastCutFlow.tsx lib/google-search.ts components/admin/prompt-refiner-chat.tsx package.json package-lock.json)

Bash(git -C "e:/Github/hybe-hydra" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Improve Fast Cut image search with dimensions, copyright filter

- Display image dimensions badge on search results
- Remove Mixed tab from image source selection (Web Search only)
- Change Google image size filter from "large" to "huge" (1024x768+)
- Add Creative Commons license filter to exclude copyrighted images
- Add rights parameter support to Google search functions

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
